This site was created through R Markdown and is hosted on github.

The data used on the flex dashboard is from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Association (NOAA). It contains information on the weather collected from stations in New York from 1981-2010. The data includes variables of weather station ID, date, minimum temperature, maximum temperature, precipitation, snowfall, and snow depth.
